messages.message: Hello, I think someone enabled Ghost Inspector test results sent to my email and I'm in the process of getting about 100 emails :grimacing: I switched it off, but please let me know if this was you and we can figure out a different way to handle these old tests!

This might've been me :flushed: but i _think_ I only enabled the test suite here (https://jenkins.instabase.com/view/Tests/job/Ghost%20Inspector%20on%20UAT/) and updated the branch in the build schedule. Not sure which option I maybe fat fingered to cause the email results

Oh weird!! Do you think we can turn off the auto running on ghost inspector? I'm trying to collect more data from the frontend team but I think we've transferred almost all our tests over to cypress and don't really need to run the ghost inspector ones anymore (especially on an automated schedule)
Oh okay I wasn't sure what the ghost inspector suites were for but if they're not needed anymore I can disable them. I can also not re-enable the ones on dogfood after uat period.
Thank you!! Yeah they're kind of legacy tests at this point ince we switched to cypress

Should be disabled now. I'll update the release coordinator guide to ignore those two jenkins test suites. So Cypress has a way to also run against UAT? How does that switch from dogfood to uat happen?
